title: AI Market Analysis FAQs
subtitle: Your questions about our data and analytics tools, answered.

faqItems.question: Where does your market and property data come from?
faqItems.answer: Our platform aggregates data from a wide array of sources, including public records, MLS feeds, and real-time listing data from hundreds of websites, covering over 140 million properties nationwide.

faqItems.question: How accurate are the rent estimates and market trends?
faqItems.answer: Our estimates are highly accurate as they are based on real-time listing data and historical trends. We update over 500,000 property records daily to ensure our insights reflect current market conditions.

faqItems.question: What does it mean to 'Arm Your Agents'?
faqItems.answer: It means you can select a market report and give it to your AI Sales Agents as context. The AI will then be able to reference specific data points from that report (like rent growth or property type demand) in its live conversations with sellers, making it sound exceptionally knowledgeable.

faqItems.question: Can I track my existing portfolio of properties?
faqItems.answer: Yes. You can add your current properties to your portfolio to track their estimated rental value over time and receive automated alerts about market shifts or new comps in their area.
